creator: glenmazza@yahoo.com
text:
This page is a replacement for the examples.xml on the Main tab, from this 
topic: http://marc.theaimsgroup.com/?l=fop-dev&m=105309447931715&w=2 

Currently it just combines the two examples.xml pages from the Development and 
Main tabs, with a few minor textual changes.  With this change, the 
examples.xml on the Development tab can be removed.

creator: glenmazza@yahoo.com
text:
Created attachment 6489
patch file for combined examples.xml

creator: jeremias@apache.org
text: Applied. Thanks. Sorry for the delay.

creator: glenmazza@yahoo.com
text:
Jeremias/or another committer, 
Please update the book.xml on the "DEV" page to remove the (now dead) link to 
examples.xml.

Index: book.xml

Done. Sorry, I thought I had done it already.
